column1: MRI snapshot size (256, 128, 1) with weighted imaging in T2, illustrating the skull of a man of 37 years old, of axial section n°166 starting from the base of the skull. The observed details include: the white matter of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 2276.8066 mm³, the cortex of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 4325.5371 mm³, the white matter of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 2346.6797 mm³ and the cortex of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 4341.3574 mm³.
